## ConsentGrantedEvent interface

A Consent Granted Event Used for tracking when a user grants their consent

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface ConsentGrantedEvent 
```

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [description?](./node-tracker.consentgrantedevent.description.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Description of the document granting consent |

|  [id](./node-tracker.consentgrantedevent.id.md) | string | Identifier for the document granting consent |
